mapper.select: select membership_type, expiration_date from membership where user_id = #{userId} and expiration_date >= sysdate
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBERSHIP M INNER JOIN USERS U ON U.USER_ID = M.USER_ID WHERE M.IS_CANCELED = 'N'

SELECT NVL(SUM(D.AMOUNT), 0) + NVL(SUM(FLOOR(MONTHS_BETWEEN(LEAST(SYSDATE, TO_DATE(M.EXPIRATION_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD')), TO_DATE(M.RENEWAL_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD'))) * 3000), 0) AS 총기부금 FROM MEMBERSHIP M LEFT JOIN DONATION_HISTORY D ON M.USER_ID = D.USER_ID WHERE M.IS_CANCELED = 'N'

SELECT ((SELECT NVL(SUM(D.AMOUNT), 0) + NVL(SUM(FLOOR(MONTHS_BETWEEN(LEAST(SYSDATE, TO_DATE(M.EXPIRATION_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD')), TO_DATE(M.RENEWAL_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD'))) * 3000), 0) FROM MEMBERSHIP M LEFT JOIN DONATION_HISTORY D ON M.USER_ID = D.USER_ID WHERE M.IS_CANCELED = 'N') + (SELECT NVL(SUM(AMOUNT), 0) FROM DONATION_HISTORY WHERE USER_ID NOT IN ( SELECT USER_ID FROM MEMBERSHIP WHERE IS_CANCELED = 'N' ))) AS 총기부금 FROM DUAL
